data.name: Odd Keystone
data.summary: Use on the tower on Route 209 to encounter Spiritomb if you have at least 32 Underground greetings.
data.description: Place in the tower on []{location:sinnoh-route-209}.  Check the stone to encounter a []{pokemon:spiritomb}, as long as the trainer's Underground status card counts at least 32 greetings.
